name: File
description: The File connector allows you to connect to Local and remote (using protocols FTP, FTPS, SFTP) file systems and perform file related operations. The file connector uses the Apache Commons VFS I/O functionalities to execute operations. (Note: You need to have U2 updated versions after 25 th JUL 2023 up to MI-1.2.0 to MI-4.2.0)

operations.name: copy
operations.description: Copies the File or Folder Specified by SourcePath into TargetPath

params.name: sourcePath
params.description: The path to the file to be copied.

params.name: targetPath
params.description: The target directory where to copy the file.

params.name: sourceFilePattern
params.description: The pattern (regex) of the files to be copied. (e.g., [a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z]*.(txt|xml|jar)).

params.name: includeParent
params.description: Whether to copy including parent folder of the source folder or only content inside.

params.name: overwrite
params.description: Whether or not to overwrite the file if the target destination already exists.

params.name: renameTo
params.description: The new name for the copied file. If not provided, the original file name is kept.

params.name: maxRetries
params.description: The maximum number of retries to be done in case of a failure.

params.name: retryDelay
params.description: The time interval between retries in milliseconds.

params.name: diskShareAccessMask
params.description: Comma separated access mask values for disk share. This is only applicable for SMB2 connection type.

params.name: responseVariable
params.description: Name of the variable to which the output of the operation should be assigned

params.name: overwriteBody
params.description: Replace the Message Body in Message Context with the output of the operation (This will remove the payload from the above variable).

operations.name: splitFile
operations.description: Split a file into multiple smaller files

params.name: sourceFilePath
params.description: Path to the file to split

params.name: targetDirectory
params.description: Folder to place split files. If already exists, it will get overwritten.

params.name: splitMode
params.description: The chunk size in bytes to split the file. Supported values: Chunk Size, Line Count, XPATH Expression

params.name: chunkSize
params.description: The chunk size in bytes to split the file.

params.name: lineCount
params.description: The number of lines per file.

params.name: xpathExpression
params.description: The XPATH expression used to split file.

params.name: diskShareAccessMask
params.description: Comma separated access mask values for disk share. This is only applicable for SMB2 connection type.

params.name: responseVariable
params.description: Name of the variable to which the output of the operation should be assigned

params.name: overwriteBody
params.description: Replace the Message Body in Message Context with the output of the operation (This will remove the payload from the above variable).

operations.name: read
operations.description: Read a file or files in a directory

params.name: path
params.description: Path to the file or folder to read.

params.name: filePattern
params.description: File pattern to match when choosing files to read in a folder. Not applicable when reading a file.

params.name: readMode
params.description: Read mode to use.  Supported values: Complete File, Starting From Line, Up To Line, Between Lines, Specific Line, Metadata Only

params.name: startLineNum
params.description: Read file starting from this line.

params.name: endLineNum
params.description: Read file up to this line.

params.name: lineNum
params.description: Specific line number to read

params.name: contentType
params.description: MIME type of the message generated. If not provided it will try to interpret.

params.name: encoding
params.description: Encoding of the message generated.

params.name: enableStreaming
params.description: Read the file in streaming manner.

params.name: enableLock
params.description: Whether to lock the file when reading

params.name: maxRetries
params.description: The maximum number of retries to be done in case of a failure.

params.name: retryDelay
params.description: The time interval between retries in milliseconds.

params.name: diskShareAccessMask
params.description: Comma separated access mask values for disk share. This is only applicable for SMB2 connection type.

params.name: responseVariable
params.description: Name of the variable to which the output of the operation should be assigned

params.name: overwriteBody
params.description: Replace the Message Body in Message Context with the output of the operation (This will remove the payload from the above variable).

operations.name: compress
operations.description: Archives a File or a Directory

params.name: sourceDirectoryPath
params.description: Path to file/folder to compress

params.name: targetFilePath
params.description: Path to the Zip file to create.

params.name: includeSubDirectories
params.description: Whether to include sub-directories when compressing.

params.name: diskShareAccessMask
params.description: Comma separated access mask values for disk share. This is only applicable for SMB2 connection type.

params.name: responseVariable
params.description: Name of the variable to which the output of the operation should be assigned

params.name: overwriteBody
params.description: Replace the Message Body in Message Context with the output of the operation (This will remove the payload from the above variable).

operations.name: write
operations.description: create file and writes the content

params.name: filePath
params.description: Path of the file to be written.

params.name: contentOrExpression
params.description: Static content or expression to receive content. If not given what is message body will get written.

params.name: mimeType
params.description: MIME Type of the message. When formatting message for writing this will be used. Supported values: Automatic, text/plain, application/xml, application/binary, application/json, text/xml

params.name: writeMode
params.description: Write mode to use - overwrite, append or create new. Supported values: Overwrite, Append, Create New

params.name: appendPosition
params.description: Position to append the content. Only used when WriteMode is APPEND.

params.name: encoding
params.description: Content Encoding. Applied when a value for content/expression is present.

params.name: compress
params.description: Whether to compress as a zip and write. Available only when WriteMode is Create New or OverWrite.

params.name: appendNewLine
params.description: Whether to append a new line character the the end of written content.

params.name: enableStreaming
params.description: Write to the file in streaming manner.

params.name: enableLock
params.description: Whether to lock the file when writing

params.name: updateLastModified
params.description: Set as false to skip updating the last modified timestamp

params.name: maxRetries
params.description: The maximum number of retries to be done in case of a failure.

params.name: retryDelay
params.description: The time interval between retries in milliseconds.

params.name: diskShareAccessMask
params.description: Comma separated access mask values for disk share. This is only applicable for SMB2 connection type.

params.name: responseVariable
params.description: Name of the variable to which the output of the operation should be assigned

params.name: overwriteBody
params.description: Replace the Message Body in Message Context with the output of the operation (This will remove the payload from the above variable).

operations.name: mergeFiles
operations.description: Merge Multiple Files into a Single File

params.name: sourceDirectoryPath
params.description: Path to the source folder containing files to be merged.

params.name: targetFilePath
params.description: Path to create merged file. If already exists, it will get overwritten.

params.name: filePattern
params.description: Pattern of files include in merging.

params.name: writeMode
params.description: Pattern of files include in merging. Supported values: Overwrite, Append

params.name: diskShareAccessMask
params.description: Comma separated access mask values for disk share. This is only applicable for SMB2 connection type.

params.name: responseVariable
params.description: Name of the variable to which the output of the operation should be assigned

params.name: overwriteBody
params.description: Replace the Message Body in Message Context with the output of the operation (This will remove the payload from the above variable).

operations.name: createDirectory
operations.description: Create Directory

params.name: directoryPath
params.description: Path to new directory.

params.name: diskShareAccessMask
params.description: Comma separated access mask values for disk share. This is only applicable for SMB2 connection type.

params.name: responseVariable
params.description: Name of the variable to which the output of the operation should be assigned

params.name: overwriteBody
params.description: Replace the Message Body in Message Context with the output of the operation (This will remove the payload from the above variable).

operations.name: listFiles
operations.description: List Files In Directory

params.name: directoryPath
params.description: Path to directory to list files in.

params.name: matchingPattern
params.description: File pattern to match when listing

params.name: recursive
params.description: List files in sub-directories

params.name: responseFormat
params.description: Response will be formatted as per this attribute. Supported values: Hierarchical, Flat

params.name: sortingAttribute
params.description: Files will be listed as per attribute. Supported values: Name, Size, LastModifiedTime

params.name: sortingOrder
params.description: Order you need to sort in ascending or descending order Supported values: Ascending, Descending

params.name: maxRetries
params.description: The maximum number of retries to be done in case of a failure.

params.name: retryDelay
params.description: The time interval between retries in milliseconds.

params.name: diskShareAccessMask
params.description: Comma separated access mask values for disk share. This is only applicable for SMB2 connection type.

params.name: responseVariable
params.description: Name of the variable to which the output of the operation should be assigned

params.name: overwriteBody
params.description: Replace the Message Body in Message Context with the output of the operation (This will remove the payload from the above variable).

operations.name: move
operations.description: Moves the File or Folder Specified by SourcePath into TargetPath

params.name: sourcePath
params.description: The path to the file to be copied.

params.name: targetPath
params.description: The target directory where to copy the file.

params.name: createParentDirectories
params.description: Whether or not to create parent directories if they don’t exist in the target path.

params.name: includeParent
params.description: Whether to copy including parent folder of the source folder or only content inside.

params.name: overwrite
params.description: Whether or not to overwrite the file if the target destination already exists.

params.name: renameTo
params.description: The new name for the copied file. If not provided, the original file name is kept.

params.name: filePattern
params.description: The pattern (regex) of the files to be moved.

params.name: isSourceMounted
params.description: Whether the source path is a mounted path or not.

params.name: isTargetMounted
params.description: Whether the target path is a mounted path or not.

params.name: diskShareAccessMask
params.description: Comma separated access mask values for disk share. This is only applicable for SMB2 connection type.

params.name: responseVariable
params.description: Name of the variable to which the output of the operation should be assigned

params.name: overwriteBody
params.description: Replace the Message Body in Message Context with the output of the operation (This will remove the payload from the above variable).

operations.name: rename
operations.description: Rename the file to the new name specified

params.name: path
params.description: The path to the file or folder to rename

params.name: renameTo
params.description: New name of the file or folder

params.name: overwrite
params.description: Whether or not to overwrite the file if a file with new name already exists

params.name: diskShareAccessMask
params.description: Comma separated access mask values for disk share. This is only applicable for SMB2 connection type.

params.name: responseVariable
params.description: Name of the variable to which the output of the operation should be assigned

params.name: overwriteBody
params.description: Replace the Message Body in Message Context with the output of the operation (This will remove the payload from the above variable).

operations.name: delete
operations.description: Delete File Or Folder

params.name: path
params.description: Path to file or directory to delete.

params.name: matchingPattern
params.description: Pattern (regex) to match file name. Matching files will get removed. If not provided all files will get removed

params.name: maxRetries
params.description: The maximum number of retries to be done in case of a failure.

params.name: retryDelay
params.description: The time interval between retries in milliseconds.

params.name: diskShareAccessMask
params.description: Comma separated access mask values for disk share. This is only applicable for SMB2 connection type.

params.name: responseVariable
params.description: Name of the variable to which the output of the operation should be assigned

params.name: overwriteBody
params.description: Replace the Message Body in Message Context with the output of the operation (This will remove the payload from the above variable).

operations.name: checkExist
operations.description: Check Existence of a File or Directory

params.name: path
params.description: Path to zip file to extract

params.name: diskShareAccessMask
params.description: Comma separated access mask values for disk share. This is only applicable for SMB2 connection type.

params.name: responseVariable
params.description: Name of the variable to which the output of the operation should be assigned

params.name: overwriteBody
params.description: Replace the Message Body in Message Context with the output of the operation (This will remove the payload from the above variable).

operations.name: exploreZipFile
operations.description: List Items In ZIP File Without Extracting

params.name: zipFilePath
params.description: Path to zip file to explore

params.name: diskShareAccessMask
params.description: Comma separated access mask values for disk share. This is only applicable for SMB2 connection type.

params.name: responseVariable
params.description: Name of the variable to which the output of the operation should be assigned

params.name: overwriteBody
params.description: Replace the Message Body in Message Context with the output of the operation (This will remove the payload from the above variable).

operations.name: unzip
operations.description: Unzip File to Target Directory

params.name: sourceFilePath
params.description: Path to zip file to extract

params.name: targetDirectory
params.description: Folder to extract. If already exists, it will get overwritten.

params.name: diskShareAccessMask
params.description: Comma separated access mask values for disk share. This is only applicable for SMB2 connection type.

params.name: responseVariable
params.description: Name of the variable to which the output of the operation should be assigned

params.name: overwriteBody
params.description: Replace the Message Body in Message Context with the output of the operation (This will remove the payload from the above variable).

operations.name: fetchDirectoryContent
operations.description: Fetch file content in a folder in to list of base64 encoded stream

params.name: directoryPath
params.description: The path to the directory to list files

params.name: matchingPattern
params.description: Pattern to match when listing files

params.name: recursive
params.description: Whether to list files in sub-directories

params.name: sortingAttribute
params.description: Files will be listed as per attribute. Supported values: Name, Size, LastModifiedTime

params.name: sortingOrder
params.description: Order you need to sort in ascending or descending order Supported values: Ascending, Descending

params.name: resultPropertyName
params.description: Name of property to add the list of base64 encoded files operation result

params.name: diskShareAccessMask
params.description: Comma separated access mask values for disk share. This is only applicable for SMB2 connection type.

params.name: responseVariable
params.description: Name of the variable to which the output of the operation should be assigned

params.name: storeResponseInVariable
params.description: Store the response payload in the variable specified above.

params.name: overwriteBody
params.description: Replace the Message Body in Message Context with the response of the operation.

connections.name: SMB2
connections.description: SMB Connection Config

params.name: connectionName
params.description: The name for the file connection

params.name: host
params.description: Host name of the SMB server

params.name: port
params.description: The port number of the SMB server

params.name: username
params.description: Username used to connect with the SMB server

params.name: password
params.description: Password to connect with the SMB server

params.name: encodePassword
params.description: Enable this to encode the password if it has special characters

params.name: enableEncryption
params.description: Enable this to enable encryption when connecting to a file share that enforces encryption

params.name: maxActiveConnections
params.description: The maximum number of objects (including both idle and active/borrowed) that can exist within the pool at the same time

params.name: maxIdleConnections
params.description: The maximum number of objects that can remain idle in the pool

params.name: maxWaitTime
params.description: The maximum amount of time that the borrowObject() method should block

params.name: evictionCheckInterval
params.description: The time interval between runs of the idle object evictor thread

params.name: minEvictionTime
params.description: The minimum amount of time an object must sit idle in the pool before it is eligible for eviction by the idle object evictor

params.name: exhaustedAction
params.description: Determines the action to take when the borrowObject() method is called, but the pool is exhausted

connections.name: SFTP
connections.description: SFTP Connection Config

params.name: connectionName
params.description: The name for the file connection

params.name: host
params.description: Host name of the FTP server

params.name: port
params.description: The port number of the FTP server

params.name: username
params.description: Username used to connect with the FTP server

params.name: password
params.description: Password to connect with the FTP server

params.name: encodePassword
params.description: Enable this to encode the password if it has special characters

params.name: userDirIsRoot
params.description: True if user directory is considered as root directory

params.name: workingDir
params.description: Working directory. File paths in operations should be given w.r.t this folder. Eg: /Users/username/Downloads

params.name: strictHostKeyChecking
params.description: Specifies whether the Host key should be checked. If set to 'true', the connector (JSch) will always verify the public key (fingerprint) of the SSH/SFTP server. Default 'no'

params.name: privateKeyFilePath
params.description: The identity files (private key file used to ssh). Public key should be installed on the server.

params.name: privateKeyPassword
params.description: The passphrase of the private key. The security of a key (even if encrypted) is retained because it is not available to anyone else. You can specify the passphrase when generating keys.

params.name: setAvoidPermission
params.description: Set to true if you want to avoid permission check. Supported values: false, true

params.name: maxActiveConnections
params.description: The maximum number of objects (including both idle and active/borrowed) that can exist within the pool at the same time

params.name: maxIdleConnections
params.description: The maximum number of connections that can remain idle in the pool at any time, awaiting to be borrowed. Excess idle objects may be removed.

params.name: maxWaitTime
params.description: This parameter determines how long the connector is willing to wait in the queue for a connection to become available. If the wait time exceeds the configured maximum wait time, the pool may throw an exception when it is exhausted and no connections are available.

params.name: evictionCheckInterval
params.description: This parameter specifies how frequently the evictor thread scans the pool for idle connections eligible for eviction. By configuring this interval, developers can control the frequency of resource checks, optimizing performance without unnecessary overhead.

params.name: minEvictionTime
params.description: Connections in the pool must remain idle for at least this specified duration before the evictor considers them for removal. This ensures that only connections inactive beyond a defined threshold are evicted, preventing premature eviction of frequently used resources.

params.name: exhaustedAction
params.description: Determines the action to take when the borrowObject() method is called, but the pool is exhausted.

params.name: sftpPoolConnectionAgedTimeout
params.description: Interval to close connections in the connection pool in seconds

params.name: sftpConnectionTimeout
params.description: The Jsch connection timeout in milli seconds.

params.name: sftpSessionTimeout
params.description: The Jsch session timeout in milli seconds.

params.name: fileLockScheme
params.description: File Locking Behaviour to use in operations associated with this connection. Supported values: Local, Cluster

connections.name: FTP
connections.description: FTP Connection Config

params.name: connectionName
params.description: The name for the file connection

params.name: host
params.description: Host name of the FTP server

params.name: port
params.description: The port number of the FTP server

params.name: username
params.description: Username used to connect with the FTP server

params.name: password
params.description: Password to connect with the FTP server

params.name: encodePassword
params.description: Enable this to encode the password if it has special characters

params.name: userDirIsRoot
params.description: True if user directory is considered as root directory

params.name: workingDir
params.description: Working directory. File paths in operations should be given w.r.t this folder. Eg: /Users/username/Downloads

params.name: isPassive
params.description: True if to enter into passive mode

params.name: ftpConnectionTimeout
params.description: Timeout in milisec for initial control connection

params.name: retryCount
params.description: Number of times to retry for FTP Connection

params.name: ftpSocketTimeout
params.description: Socket timeout for FTP client

params.name: fileLockScheme
params.description: File Locking Behaviour to use in operations associated with this connection. Supported values: Local, Cluster

connections.name: FTPS
connections.description: Secured FTP Connection Config

params.name: connectionName
params.description: The name for the file connection

params.name: host
params.description: Host name of the FTP server

params.name: port
params.description: The port number of the FTP server

params.name: username
params.description: Username used to connect with the FTP server

params.name: password
params.description: Password to connect with the FTP server

params.name: encodePassword
params.description: Enable this to encode the password if it has special characters

params.name: userDirIsRoot
params.description: True if user directory is considered as root directory

params.name: workingDir
params.description: Working directory. File paths in operations should be given w.r.t this folder. Eg: /Users/username/Downloads

params.name: keyStorePath
params.description: Path to keyStore

params.name: keyStorePassword
params.description: KeyStore password

params.name: trustStorePath
params.description: Path to trustStore

params.name: trustStorePassword
params.description: TrustStore Password

params.name: isPassive
params.description: True if to enter into passive mode

params.name: ftpConnectionTimeout
params.description: Timeout in milisec for initial control connection

params.name: ftpSocketTimeout
params.description: Socket timeout for FTP client

params.name: implicitModeEnabled
params.description: True if implicit mode is enabled (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/FTPS#Implicit)

params.name: channelProtectionLevel
params.description: FTP Data Channel protection level. Possible values C,S,E,P

params.name: fileLockScheme
params.description: File Locking Behaviour to use in operations associated with this connection. Supported values: Local, Cluster

params.description: Pattern of files include in merging.

params.name: writeMode
params.description: Pattern of files include in merging. Supported values: Overwrite, Append

params.name: diskShareAccessMask
params.description: Comma separated access mask values for disk share. This is only applicable for SMB2 connection type.

params.name: responseVariable
params.description: Name of the variable to which the output of the operation should be assigned

params.name: overwriteBody
params.description: Replace the Message Body in Message Context with the output of the operation (This will remove the payload from the above variable).

operations.name: createDirectory
operations.description: Create Directory

params.name: directoryPath
params.description: Path to new directory.

params.name: diskShareAccessMask
params.description: Comma separated access mask values for disk share. This is only applicable for SMB2 connection type.

params.name: responseVariable
params.description: Name of the variable to which the output of the operation should be assigned

params.name: overwriteBody
params.description: Replace the Message Body in Message Context with the output of the operation (This will remove the payload from the above variable).

operations.name: listFiles
operations.description: List Files In Directory

params.name: directoryPath
params.description: Path to directory to list files in.

params.name: matchingPattern
params.description: File pattern to match when listing

params.name: recursive
params.description: List files in sub-directories

params.name: responseFormat
params.description: Response will be formatted as per this attribute. Supported values: Hierarchical, Flat

params.name: sortingAttribute
params.description: Files will be listed as per attribute. Supported values: Name, Size, LastModifiedTime

params.name: sortingOrder
params.description: Order you need to sort in ascending or descending order Supported values: Ascending, Descending

params.name: maxRetries
params.description: The maximum number of retries to be done in case of a failure.

params.name: retryDelay
params.description: The time interval between retries in milliseconds.

params.name: diskShareAccessMask
params.description: Comma separated access mask values for disk share. This is only applicable for SMB2 connection type.

params.name: responseVariable
params.description: Name of the variable to which the output of the operation should be assigned

params.name: overwriteBody
params.description: Replace the Message Body in Message Context with the output of the operation (This will remove the payload from the above variable).

operations.name: move
operations.description: Moves the File or Folder Specified by SourcePath into TargetPath

params.name: sourcePath
params.description: The path to the file to be copied.

params.name: targetPath
params.description: The target directory where to copy the file.

params.name: createParentDirectories
params.description: Whether or not to create parent directories if they don’t exist in the target path.

params.name: includeParent
params.description: Whether to copy including parent folder of the source folder or only content inside.

params.name: overwrite
params.description: Whether or not to overwrite the file if the target destination already exists.

params.name: renameTo
params.description: The new name for the copied file. If not provided, the original file name is kept.

params.name: filePattern
params.description: The pattern (regex) of the files to be moved.

params.name: isSourceMounted
params.description: Whether the source path is a mounted path or not.

params.name: isTargetMounted
params.description: Whether the target path is a mounted path or not.

params.name: diskShareAccessMask
params.description: Comma separated access mask values for disk share. This is only applicable for SMB2 connection type.

params.name: responseVariable
params.description: Name of the variable to which the output of the operation should be assigned

params.name: overwriteBody
params.description: Replace the Message Body in Message Context with the output of the operation (This will remove the payload from the above variable).

operations.name: rename
operations.description: Rename the file to the new name specified

params.name: path
params.description: The path to the file or folder to rename

params.name: renameTo
params.description: New name of the file or folder

params.name: overwrite
params.description: Whether or not to overwrite the file if a file with new name already exists

params.name: diskShareAccessMask
params.description: Comma separated access mask values for disk share. This is only applicable for SMB2 connection type.

params.name: responseVariable
params.description: Name of the variable to which the output of the operation should be assigned

params.name: overwriteBody
params.description: Replace the Message Body in Message Context with the output of the operation (This will remove the payload from the above variable).

operations.name: delete
operations.description: Delete File Or Folder

params.name: path
params.description: Path to file or directory to delete.

params.name: matchingPattern
params.description: Pattern (regex) to match file name. Matching files will get removed. If not provided all files will get removed

params.name: maxRetries
params.description: The maximum number of retries to be done in case of a failure.

params.name: retryDelay
params.description: The time interval between retries in milliseconds.

params.name: diskShareAccessMask
params.description: Comma separated access mask values for disk share. This is only applicable for SMB2 connection type.

params.name: responseVariable
params.description: Name of the variable to which the output of the operation should be assigned

params.name: overwriteBody
params.description: Replace the Message Body in Message Context with the output of the operation (This will remove the payload from the above variable).

operations.name: checkExist
operations.description: Check Existence of a File or Directory

params.name: path
params.description: Path to zip file to extract

params.name: diskShareAccessMask
params.description: Comma separated access mask values for disk share. This is only applicable for SMB2 connection type.

params.name: responseVariable
params.description: Name of the variable to which the output of the operation should be assigned

params.name: overwriteBody
params.description: Replace the Message Body in Message Context with the output of the operation (This will remove the payload from the above variable).

operations.name: exploreZipFile
operations.description: List Items In ZIP File Without Extracting

params.name: zipFilePath
params.description: Path to zip file to explore

params.name: diskShareAccessMask
params.description: Comma separated access mask values for disk share. This is only applicable for SMB2 connection type.

params.name: responseVariable
params.description: Name of the variable to which the output of the operation should be assigned

params.name: overwriteBody
params.description: Replace the Message Body in Message Context with the output of the operation (This will remove the payload from the above variable).

operations.name: unzip
operations.description: Unzip File to Target Directory

params.name: sourceFilePath
params.description: Path to zip file to extract

params.name: targetDirectory
params.description: Folder to extract. If already exists, it will get overwritten.

params.name: diskShareAccessMask
params.description: Comma separated access mask values for disk share. This is only applicable for SMB2 connection type.

params.name: responseVariable
params.description: Name of the variable to which the output of the operation should be assigned

params.name: overwriteBody
params.description: Replace the Message Body in Message Context with the output of the operation (This will remove the payload from the above variable).

operations.name: fetchDirectoryContent
operations.description: Fetch file content in a folder in to list of base64 encoded stream

params.name: directoryPath
params.description: The path to the directory to list files

params.name: matchingPattern
params.description: Pattern to match when listing files

params.name: recursive
params.description: Whether to list files in sub-directories

params.name: sortingAttribute
params.description: Files will be listed as per attribute. Supported values: Name, Size, LastModifiedTime

params.name: sortingOrder
params.description: Order you need to sort in ascending or descending order Supported values: Ascending, Descending

params.name: resultPropertyName
params.description: Name of property to add the list of base64 encoded files operation result

params.name: diskShareAccessMask
params.description: Comma separated access mask values for disk share. This is only applicable for SMB2 connection type.

params.name: responseVariable
params.description: Name of the variable to which the output of the operation should be assigned

params.name: storeResponseInVariable
params.description: Store the response payload in the variable specified above.

params.name: overwriteBody
params.description: Replace the Message Body in Message Context with the response of the operation.

connections.name: SMB2
connections.description: SMB Connection Config

params.name: connectionName
params.description: The name for the file connection

params.name: host
params.description: Host name of the SMB server

params.name: port
params.description: The port number of the SMB server

params.name: username
params.description: Username used to connect with the SMB server

params.name: password
params.description: Password to connect with the SMB server

params.name: encodePassword
params.description: Enable this to encode the password if it has special characters

params.name: enableEncryption
params.description: Enable this to enable encryption when connecting to a file share that enforces encryption

params.name: maxActiveConnections
params.description: The maximum number of objects (including both idle and active/borrowed) that can exist within the pool at the same time

params.name: maxIdleConnections
params.description: The maximum number of objects that can remain idle in the pool

params.name: maxWaitTime
params.description: The maximum amount of time that the borrowObject() method should block

params.name: evictionCheckInterval
params.description: The time interval between runs of the idle object evictor thread

params.name: minEvictionTime
params.description: The minimum amount of time an object must sit idle in the pool before it is eligible for eviction by the idle object evictor

params.name: exhaustedAction
params.description: Determines the action to take when the borrowObject() method is called, but the pool is exhausted

connections.name: SFTP
connections.description: SFTP Connection Config

params.name: connectionName
params.description: The name for the file connection

params.name: host
params.description: Host name of the FTP server

params.name: port
params.description: The port number of the FTP server

params.name: username
params.description: Username used to connect with the FTP server

params.name: password
params.description: Password to connect with the FTP server

params.name: encodePassword
params.description: Enable this to encode the password if it has special characters

params.name: userDirIsRoot
params.description: True if user directory is considered as root directory

params.name: workingDir
params.description: Working directory. File paths in operations should be given w.r.t this folder. Eg: /Users/username/Downloads

params.name: strictHostKeyChecking
params.description: Specifies whether the Host key should be checked. If set to 'true', the connector (JSch) will always verify the public key (fingerprint) of the SSH/SFTP server. Default 'no'

params.name: privateKeyFilePath
params.description: The identity files (private key file used to ssh). Public key should be installed on the server.

params.name: privateKeyPassword
params.description: The passphrase of the private key. The security of a key (even if encrypted) is retained because it is not available to anyone else. You can specify the passphrase when generating keys.

params.name: setAvoidPermission
params.description: Set to true if you want to avoid permission check. Supported values: false, true

params.name: maxActiveConnections
params.description: The maximum number of objects (including both idle and active/borrowed) that can exist within the pool at the same time

params.name: maxIdleConnections
params.description: The maximum number of connections that can remain idle in the pool at any time, awaiting to be borrowed. Excess idle objects may be removed.

params.name: maxWaitTime
params.description: This parameter determines how long the connector is willing to wait in the queue for a connection to become available. If the wait time exceeds the configured maximum wait time, the pool may throw an exception when it is exhausted and no connections are available.

params.name: evictionCheckInterval
params.description: This parameter specifies how frequently the evictor thread scans the pool for idle connections eligible for eviction. By configuring this interval, developers can control the frequency of resource checks, optimizing performance without unnecessary overhead.

params.name: minEvictionTime
params.description: Connections in the pool must remain idle for at least this specified duration before the evictor considers them for removal. This ensures that only connections inactive beyond a defined threshold are evicted, preventing premature eviction of frequently used resources.

params.name: exhaustedAction
params.description: Determines the action to take when the borrowObject() method is called, but the pool is exhausted.

params.name: sftpPoolConnectionAgedTimeout
params.description: Interval to close connections in the connection pool in seconds

params.name: sftpConnectionTimeout
params.description: The Jsch connection timeout in milli seconds.

params.name: sftpSessionTimeout
params.description: The Jsch session timeout in milli seconds.

params.name: fileLockScheme
params.description: File Locking Behaviour to use in operations associated with this connection. Supported values: Local, Cluster

connections.name: FTP
connections.description: FTP Connection Config

params.name: connectionName
params.description: The name for the file connection

params.name: host
params.description: Host name of the FTP server

params.name: port
params.description: The port number of the FTP server

params.name: username
params.description: Username used to connect with the FTP server

params.name: password
params.description: Password to connect with the FTP server

params.name: encodePassword
params.description: Enable this to encode the password if it has special characters

params.name: userDirIsRoot
params.description: True if user directory is considered as root directory

params.name: workingDir
params.description: Working directory. File paths in operations should be given w.r.t this folder. Eg: /Users/username/Downloads

params.name: isPassive
params.description: True if to enter into passive mode

params.name: ftpConnectionTimeout
params.description: Timeout in milisec for initial control connection

params.name: retryCount
params.description: Number of times to retry for FTP Connection

params.name: ftpSocketTimeout
params.description: Socket timeout for FTP client

params.name: fileLockScheme
params.description: File Locking Behaviour to use in operations associated with this connection. Supported values: Local, Cluster

connections.name: FTPS
connections.description: Secured FTP Connection Config

params.name: connectionName
params.description: The name for the file connection

params.name: host
params.description: Host name of the FTP server

params.name: port
params.description: The port number of the FTP server

params.name: username
params.description: Username used to connect with the FTP server

params.name: password
params.description: Password to connect with the FTP server

params.name: encodePassword
params.description: Enable this to encode the password if it has special characters

params.name: userDirIsRoot
params.description: True if user directory is considered as root directory

params.name: workingDir
params.description: Working directory. File paths in operations should be given w.r.t this folder. Eg: /Users/username/Downloads

params.name: keyStorePath
params.description: Path to keyStore

params.name: keyStorePassword
params.description: KeyStore password

params.name: trustStorePath
params.description: Path to trustStore

params.name: trustStorePassword
params.description: TrustStore Password

params.name: isPassive
params.description: True if to enter into passive mode

params.name: ftpConnectionTimeout
params.description: Timeout in milisec for initial control connection

params.name: ftpSocketTimeout
params.description: Socket timeout for FTP client

params.name: implicitModeEnabled
params.description: True if implicit mode is enabled (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/FTPS#Implicit)

params.name: channelProtectionLevel
params.description: FTP Data Channel protection level. Possible values C,S,E,P

params.name: fileLockScheme
params.description: File Locking Behaviour to use in operations associated with this connection. Supported values: Local, Cluster

connections.name: LOCAL
connections.description: Local File

params.name: connectionName
params.description: The name for the file connection

params.name: workingDir
params.description: Working directory. File paths in operations should be given w.r.t this folder. Eg: /Users/username/Downloads

params.name: fileLockScheme
params.description: File Locking Behaviour to use in operations associated with this connection. Supported values: Local, Cluster

operations.name: init
operations.description: Init operation

operations.name: createDirectory
operations.description: Creates a new directory on directory path.

operations.name: listFiles
operations.description: Lists all the files in the directory path that match a matcher.

operations.name: delete
operations.description: Deletes the file specified by the path.

operations.name: copy
operations.description: Copies the file or folder specified by sourcePath into targetPath.

operations.name: move
operations.description: Moves the file or folder specified by sourcePath into targetPath.

operations.name: rename
operations.description: Rename the file to the new name specified.

operations.name: unzip
operations.description: Unzip file to target directory.

operations.name: splitFile
operations.description: Split a file into multiple smaller files.

operations.name: mergeFiles
operations.description: Merge multiple files in a folder to a single file.

operations.name: checkExist
operations.description: Check if a file or directory exists.

operations.name: exploreZipFile
operations.description: List Items In ZIP File Without Extracting.

operations.name: compress
operations.description: Compress file or folder.

operations.name: read
operations.description: Read a specific file or a file in a folder.

operations.name: write
operations.description: Create a file or write content to a file.
